subject: Football
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Vikings defensive end Jared Allen needs five sacks in the next two games to tie Michael Strahan’s N.F.L. single-season record — 22 ½, in 2001.
snippet: Vikings defensive end Jared Allen needs five sacks in the next two games to tie Michael Strahan’s N.F.L. single-season record — 22 ½, in 2001.
